game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, MMO, Co-op, Online Co-op, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty
game.shortDescription: Hardcore, retro-styled RPG focused on boss fights with interesting mechanics. Demanding. At times grind-y. There are leaderboards to climb! You can team up with your friends (so they can call you useless when you inevitably miss a mechanic), or go solo. Your call, play however you want.
